item.title: Starting Offensive Security Guide
item.description: Foreword A lot of people have a very clear misconception on what it takes to excel in off-sec, what off-sec is comprised off, and what to do to learn off-sec. I won’t read you a defenition, but know that if you find the idea of writing constantly and reading constantly boring this is the wrong proffession. A friend of mine who works as a red teamer summarizes this neatly, “Its half writing and half doing, but mostly writing.
